docs.snippet: President Obama’s low-key vacations have left summer residents nostalgic for the Clintons’ active participation in the local social scene....
docs.lead_paragraph: President Obama’s low-key vacations have left summer residents nostalgic for the Clintons’ active participation in the local social scene.
docs.abstract: Political Memo; Pres Obama appears at fund-raiser for Hillary Clinton on Martha's Vineyard, where he and family are enjoying annual summer vacation; demand for tickets reflects not only continuing popularity of Obama with Vineyard residents but nostalgia for time when vacationing presidents actively participated in local events.

headline.main: Martha’s Vineyard Longs for a President Who R.S.V.P.s ‘Yes’
headline.print_headline: An Island Longs for a President Who R.S.V.P.s ‘Yes’

docs.snippet: Naming Stephen K. Bannon the campaign’s chief executive completed a merger between the most strident elements of the conservative news media and Mr. Trump’s campaign....
docs.lead_paragraph: Naming Stephen K. Bannon the campaign’s chief executive completed a merger between the most strident elements of the conservative news media and Mr. Trump’s campaign.
docs.abstract: Donald Trump names Stephen K Bannon as his new campaign chief and appoints veteran pollster and strategist Kellyanne Conway as campaign manager; Bannon is chairman of conservative Breitbart News website; Republican party veterans react with anger and dismay at choice, as it indicates that Trump is unlikely to conduct orthodox presidential campaign.

headline.main: Donald Trump Appoints Media Firebrand to Run Campaign
headline.print_headline: In Appointment, Trump Scuttles a Gentler Tone

byline.original: By JONATHAN MARTIN, JIM RUTENBERG and MAGGIE HABERMAN

docs.snippet: Mr. Trump says he will end the H-1B program, which allows certain skilled immigrants to work in the United States — including some employees of Trump Model Management....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mr. Trump says he will end the H-1B program, which allows certain skilled immigrants to work in the United States — including some employees of Trump Model Management.
docs.abstract: Donald Trump pledges to end controversial H-1B visa program without exceptions, despite fact his own companies, including Trump Modeling Management, have used program to bring hundreds of foreign workers into United States for years.

headline.main: Donald Trump Wants to Cut Visa Program He Used for His Own Models
headline.print_headline: Trump Wants to Cut Visas He Used for His Own Models

byline.contributor: Jeremy Bowers contributed reporting from Washington, and Maggie Haberman from New York.
